author: davidb
msg: Add support for groups in security.
A user can be a member of a group or have roles assigned directly.
Groups typically have one or more roles assigned. Users that are part of
that group will get these roles associated too.
Users have the union of the roles associated with the group together
with their own roles. When logging in the user will get RolePrincipal
objects for all of these. The user will also get a GroupPrincipal object
associated for each group (s)he is in.
Groups are currently implemented for the PropertiesLoginModule and
PropertiesBackingEngine. They can be gradually added to other login
This commit also contains shell commands to manage groups as well as a bunch
For example the following can be used to set up some users and groups:
